interpretation:
The "man technologist" card depicts a skilled and knowledgeable individual who is focused on technology and innovation. This card suggests that the querent may need to rely on their own technical expertise or seek out the help of someone who is knowledgeable in this field. The man technologist is a problem-solver and has a natural curiosity that drives him to find new solutions and push boundaries. 

Associated Keywords: technology, innovation, problem-solving, expertise, curiosity.

When this card appears in a reading, it may indicate that the querent needs to tap into their technical skills or seek out the guidance of an expert in order to overcome a challenge or achieve a goal. It may also suggest that the querent should approach their current situation with a logical and analytical mindset, focusing on facts and data rather than emotions. The man technologist card encourages the querent to embrace their inner innovator and use their knowledge and skills to create something new and exciting.
